titles.title: Creating Additional Residency Expansion Act
To amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to expand the program for payments to teaching health centers with GME programs, and for other purposes.
CARE Act
Creating Additional Residency Expansion Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Creating Additional Residency Expansion Act or the CARE Act
This bill temporarily expands the Teaching Health Center Graduate Medical Education Program by requiring the Health Resources and Services Administration to make payments to additional teaching health centers, with priority given to centers that are located in counties with high Medicaid enrollment.
